additional_data.description: The spirit of a ginger-laden cookie cut into the shape of a girl. The gingerbread men she bakes are imbued with a mysterious power that makes them come alive. During assignments, the fighting force of these cookies- faithful to her every command- have lead many a conflict to a swift resolution. At the moment, Ginger's greatest worry is weight gain from all that sampling during the baking process.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Clear Chapter 2
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Exchange for 200 Tiny Present
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Get a Second Half Ranking of 6001-10000.
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 7501-10000.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases the drop rate of Tiny Present during the "Shadow over Christmas" event.

skill: "My gingerbread men will wipe you out!"
summon: "My gingerbread men can help solve any assignment!"
limit_break: "Time to roll up my sleeves and get baking!"
